data.message: Session: Duro upgrade planning and eval tracking setup: 1) Critically analyzed governance roadmap - identified incident-driven vs speculative improvements. 2) Built eval_metrics skill tracking decision review rate, unverified rate, reopen rate. 3) Created weekly_eval_metrics checklist. 4) Cleared decision backlog: 44 decisions reviewed, unverified rate 88%→15%. 5) Stored 3 metrics snapshots as facts for trend tracking.
data.task: Session: Duro upgrade planning and eval tracking setup
data.outcome: 1) Critically analyzed governance roadmap - identified incident-driven vs speculative improvements. 2) Built eval_metrics skill tracking decision review rate, unverified rate, reopen rate. 3) Created weekly_eval_metrics checklist. 4) Cleared decision backlog: 44 decisions reviewed, unverified rate 88%→15%. 5) Stored 3 metrics snapshots as facts for trend tracking.
